subject: VAM Pro brackets
description_text:
Hi guys,

I'm about to buy the Plus X pedals with the VAM Pro haptics. Is there any
way to include horizontal motor position brackets rather than the vertical
that are included?

Thank you!
Juan

conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Manuel Peric,     Yes, we have already launched this product. You can purchase it with confidence.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals

It's a pity that you are charging for it. It should be included. Thought
you were different kind of brand.

This should be the included bracket since product launch.

Hi Juan Manuel Peric,    We apologize, but we will be sending the previous mounting bracket. This is an additional item, so it will incur a charge. As this is a newly launched product, our overseas warehouses currently only stock the older model. We appreciate your understanding.
You can let me know your country. If we ship from our China warehouse, you won't need to purchase new mounting brackets. We can directly replace your old ones for you.

I'm from Valencia, Spain.

Thank you for your consideration.

The "BLACK45" discount doesn't apply to the VAM Pro product. It says "You
haven't reached the minimum purchase amount for using the discount Black45".

But let's suppose I would buy the Plus X pedals. I don't want to sound
rude, I'm following the Plus X price for a long time, it costs 266€. Now
there's a black friday "BLACK45" discount, but the product price in your
website is 310€, so the discount is not true.

Is not the 2 years warranty valid from Amazon official sellers?:
[image: image.png]

Thank you.
Juan
